__e: And I don't think I'm giving away any secrets when I say you are going to be rewarded.
Fighting with us, you'll be rewarded, more than you can imagine.
Then we get the one chance, a moment to ask our questions and receive the answers.
If you do good hoping to be redeemed, is that... really good?
Because up here life is hard and the rewards are small.
So what's a secretary but somebody who does the work of three people while some other schlub gets the credit?
